whatIs.title: What is Wan Animate?
whatIs.description: Wan Animate is an advanced character animation and replacement tool that transforms static character images into dynamic video animations. Using spatially-aligned skeleton signals and implicit facial features, Wan Animate precisely replicates expressions and movements from reference videos to generate high-fidelity character animations. This powerful character animator can either animate characters standalone or seamlessly replace existing characters in videos while maintaining environmental lighting and color tone integration. Built on cutting-edge motion transfer technology, Wan Animate enables effortless character motion capture and realistic character animation synthesis with professional-grade results.

media.caption: Wan-Animate can animate any character based on a performer's video, precisely replicating the performer's facial expressions and movements to generate highly realistic character videos.

Wan-Animate can replace characters in a video with animated characters, preserving their expressions and movements while also replicating the original lighting and color tone for seamless environmental integration.

media.title: Method
media.caption: Overview of Wan-Animate, which is built upon Wan-I2V. We modify its input formulation to unify reference image input, temporal frame guidance, and environmental information (for dual-mode compatibility) under a common symbolic representation. For body motion control, we use skeleton signals that are merged via spatial alignment. For facial expression control, we leverage implicit features extracted from face images as the driving signal. Additionally, for character replacement, we train an auxiliary Relighting LoRA to enhance the character's integration with the new environment..

steps.title: Upload Character Image & Reference Video
steps.content: Upload your character image and reference video (MP4, MOV, AVI) up to 15 seconds and 50MB for Wan Animate processing. Videos longer than 15 seconds are automatically trimmed for optimal character animation generation.

steps.title: Character Animation Reference Frame
steps.content: Wan Animate extracts the first frame from your video and applies character replacement to create a reference guide for consistent character animation transfer throughout your video sequence.

steps.title: Select Character Animation Mode
steps.content: Choose from character animation templates, custom animation prompts, or upload reference character images. Select between standalone character animation or character replacement modes for Wan Animate processing.

steps.title: Generate Character Animation Video
steps.content: Wan Animate transforms your complete video using the character reference frame while preserving original motion, expressions, and timing through advanced character animation technology.
